definition: obese/bloated/swollen (style)/(fig.) (of an organization) oversized or overstaffed
to reduce swelling/detumescence/(fig.) to streamline (a bloated bureaucracy etc)
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
a bloody nose and a swollen face/badly battered

sentences.english: You are breaking some vessels and creating circulation and bruising and that may have some anti-inflammatory effects.
sentences.chinese: 這是通經活血，會出現瘀腫，這具有消炎的效果。

sentences.english: Night found him leg weary, with hands and face lashed by the branches.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚來了，他腰痠腿痛，手和臉被枝條打得又痛又腫。

sentences.english: Jim was laid up for four days and nights.
sentences.chinese: 傑姆躺了四天四夜，腫全消了，他又活動起來了。

sentences.english: Dabao to others when the body double, oneself was beaten face is swollen.
sentences.chinese: 大寶給別人當上了替身演員，自己被打得臉都腫了。

sentences.english: After all, more than 300 types of bacteria take up residence in your mouth every night.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，每天晚上有超過300腫細菌在你的口中居住。

sentences.english: Over the weekend, my joints swelled up and I had trouble swallowing.
sentences.chinese: 到來週末，我的關節腫了起來，吞嚥也變得困難。

sentences.english: Bruising can last anywhere between two days and two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 瘀腫可能會持續兩天到兩個星期。

sentences.english: The injured wrist began to swell(up).
sentences.chinese: 受傷的腕子開始腫了起來。

sentences.english: Face will be swollen the morning, what the most effective method of face-lift?
sentences.chinese: 早上起來臉就會腫，什麼方法瘦臉最有效？

sentences.english: "Her head looked like it was exploding," her father said.
sentences.chinese: “她的頭看起來腫的厲害，”她的父親說。

sentences.english: He got stung by a wasp while cutting grass and his face is swollen now.
sentences.chinese: 在割草時，他被黃蜂叮了下，現在臉都腫了。

sentences.english: Eliza appeared in the door, her face contorted by sweeping.
sentences.chinese: 意萊莎來到房門口，哭得腫臉膀腮的。
大的腺狀腫需要治療麼？

sentences.english: Palpation and imaging confirms that he does have a thyroid nodule.
sentences.chinese: 觸診和影像學檢查證實他有甲狀腺結節腫。

sentences.english: Old people casts rim of the eye, is there still extravasated blood now a little swollen still how to do?
sentences.chinese: 老年人摔傷眼眶，現在還有淤血還有些腫怎麼辦？

sentences.english: My swollen knee has given me gyp all day.
sentences.chinese: 我的膝蓋腫了，讓我整天都很受罪。

mythical horse/Internet slang for 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
